scenarios.name: 5AAA starter
scenarios.description:
5AAA 2B hjc9 j2B j66/D6/D3 j5A 5AAAA |
Common Midscreen BnB.
Doesn't work on midgets
and most crouching characters.

scenarios.name: 66A starter
scenarios.description:
66A d623B j5B j66 j6A |
Sakuya's only meterless
combo option after hitting 66A.
66A needs to hit deep enough
or 623B won't connect.
Make sure that all B knives come out,
otherwise it won't limit.
If your opponent ends up too high,
finish with j.6C instead.

scenarios.name: Corner 5AAAA starter
scenarios.description:
5AAAA hj9 j5A j6A j2B D2/D1 |
Universal BnB D2 to setup oki.

scenarios.name: Corner 6A starter
scenarios.description:
6A 6C hj9 j5A j6C j66 j5A j6A |
More damaging variant of the basic 6A,
will however drop if started with CH f.5A.
Also works some distance away from the corner.

scenarios.name: Near-Corner 5AAA starter
scenarios.description:
5AAA 2B hj9 j5C D6 j5A 5AAAA |
Near corner, More optimized version with 5A starter.

scenarios.name: 66C CH starter
scenarios.description:
66C hj9 j5A j2A 66A d623B |
The best meterless combo off of 66C.
Note that if you move into the corner due to 66C,
you have to walk back a little,
otherwise you will be facing outwards of the corner.

scenarios.name: Corner j2A CH starter
scenarios.description:
j2A hj8 D3 j5A j8 j5A j2A 66A d623B |
An optimized corner combo,
that can be done off of
highjump escapes or similar things.

scenarios.name: LV3+ d623
scenarios.description:
5AAA d623B j6C D8 j5A j6A j6C jd623C |
LV3+ Close-up magic combo.
